DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: select 1 as ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID,SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID,SPR_PRCSS_STP_NM,1 as count from SPR_PRCSS_STP_MSTR where SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID ={0}
SELECT ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID,ADMN_MTHD_NO,ADMN_MTHD_DESC, dbms_random.random FROM ADMN_MTHD_MSTR WHERE SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID = {0} AND ADMN_MTHD_NO = 0 ORDER BY ADMN_MTHD_NO

SELECT p.PSBL_ANSWR_ID, dbms_random.random, p.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR as ADMN_MTHD_NO FROM PSBL_ANSWR p, ADMN_MTHD_QSTN_ANSWR_FLTR a WHERE a.PSBL_ANSWR_ID = p.PSBL_ANSWR_ID AND a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID = {0} GROUP BY p.PSBL_ANSWR_ID, p.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR

SelectSQLQuery.name: getQualifiersForB
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select dbms_random.random ,dbms_random.random,b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR from BLVL_BNFT_LVL b where b.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = {0} and
group by b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR

SelectSQLQuery.name: getQualifiersForBC
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select dbms_random.random ,dbms_random.random,b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR from BLVL_BNFT_LVL b, BNFT_CMPNT_BNFT_CSTMZD d where b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID=d.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID and d.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = b.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID and d.BNFT_SYS_ID = {0} and d.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {2} and d.BNFT_LVL_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' and d.BNFT_LINE_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' and
group by b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR

SelectSQLQuery.name: getQualifiersForPS
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select dbms_random.random ,dbms_random.random,b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR from BLVL_BNFT_LVL b, PROD_STRCTR_BNFT_CSTMZD d where d.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID=b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID and d.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = b.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID and d.BNFT_LVL_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' and d.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {2} and d.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID = {3} and d.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' and d.BNFT_SYS_ID = {0} and d.BNFT_LINE_HIDE_FLAG='F' and
group by b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR

SelectSQLQuery.name: getQualifiersForP
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: group by b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR

SelectSQLQuery.name: getQualifiersForTierP
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: group by b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR

SelectSQLQuery.name: getQualifiersForC
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: SELECT dbms_random.random , dbms_random.random , b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR FROM BLVL_BNFT_LVL b , CNTRCT_BNFT_CODED_LINES d , ( SELECT DISTINCT a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, a.bnft_sys_id FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN A, bcm_bnft_cmpnt_mstr B WHERE a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {4} AND a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id =b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND b.bnft_cmpnt_nm ='GENERAL BENEFITS' AND a.bnft_cmpnt_hide_flag ='F' AND a.bnft_hide_flag = 'F' ) e , CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN f WHERE b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID =d.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND d.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = f.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND d.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = f.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND d.bnft_sys_id = f.bnft_sys_id AND d.bnft_defn_sys_id = f.bnft_defn_sys_id AND (d.BNFT_SYS_ID = {0} OR d.BNFT_SYS_ID = e.BNFT_SYS_ID) AND f.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND f.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND (d.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {2} OR d.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = e.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID) AND d.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {4} AND b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR IS NOT NULL AND
GROUP BY b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR

SelectSQLQuery.name: getQualifiersForTierC
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select dbms_random.random ,dbms_random.random,b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR from BLVL_BNFT_LVL b,cntrct_bnft_tier_custmzd d, ( select distinct a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, a.bnft_sys_id from CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN A, bcm_bnft_cmpnt_mstr B,CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT C where a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = C.dt_sgmnt_sys_id and a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {4} and c.prod_sys_id= {3} and a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id =b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id and b.bnft_cmpnt_nm ='GENERAL BENEFITS' and a.bnft_cmpnt_hide_flag ='F' and a.bnft_hide_flag = 'F' ) e where b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID=d.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID and (d.BNFT_SYS_ID = {0} OR d.BNFT_SYS_ID= e.BNFT_SYS_ID) and d.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID={5} and d.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG= 'F' and d.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' and d.PROD_SYS_ID= {3} and (d.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {2} OR d.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID= e.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID) and d.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {4} and d.BVAL_BNFT_VAL is not null and b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR is not null and
group by b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR

DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: select e.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM as BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM , dbms_random.random from BLVL_BNFT_LVL e where e.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = {0}

select e.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM as BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM , dbms_random.random from BNFT_CMPNT_BNFT_CSTMZD p, BLVL_BNFT_LVL e where p.BNFT_LVL_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' and p.BNFT_LINE_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' and p.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {0} and p.BNFT_SYS_ID = {1} and p.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = e.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID and e.blvl_bnft_lvl_id = p.blvl_bnft_lvl_id group by e.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM

SELECT c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM AS BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM , dbms_random.random FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_CODED_LINES a , CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN b, BLVL_BNFT_LVL c , ( SELECT DISTINCT a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, a.bnft_sys_id FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN A, bcm_bnft_cmpnt_mstr B WHERE a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {3} AND a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id =b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND b.bnft_cmpnt_nm ='GENERAL BENEFITS' AND a.bnft_cmpnt_hide_flag ='F' AND a.bnft_hide_flag = 'F' ) d, CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT e WHERE a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = b.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND a.bnft_sys_id = b.bnft_sys_id AND a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = e.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND (a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID ={0} OR a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = d.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID) AND (a.BNFT_SYS_ID = {1} OR a.BNFT_SYS_ID = d.BNFT_SYS_ID) AND e.PROD_SYS_ID = {2} AND a.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {3} AND b.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND b.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND a.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND a.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = c.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID GROUP BY c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM

SELECT c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM AS BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM , dbms_random.random FROM cntrct_bnft_tier_custmzd a, BLVL_BNFT_LVL c, ( SELECT DISTINCT a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, a.bnft_sys_id FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN A, bcm_bnft_cmpnt_mstr B WHERE a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {3} AND a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id =b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND b.bnft_cmpnt_nm ='GENERAL BENEFITS' AND a.bnft_cmpnt_hide_flag ='F' AND a.bnft_hide_flag = 'F' ) d WHERE (a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {0} OR a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = d.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID) AND (a.BNFT_SYS_ID = {1} OR a.BNFT_SYS_ID = d.BNFT_SYS_ID) AND a.PROD_SYS_ID = {2} AND a.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {3} AND a.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID = {4} AND a.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND a.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND a.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND a.BVAL_BNFT_VAL IS NOT NULL AND a.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = c.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID GROUP BY c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM
select dbms_random.random ,dbms_random.random,TRM_PRMRY_CDS from SPR_PRCSS_STP_MSTR where SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID = {0} and TRM_PRMRY_CDS is not null

SelectSQLQuery.name: getAdminMethodsForBenefit
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: SELECT d.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID, d.ADMN_MTHD_DESC, d.ADMN_MTHD_NO , d.PSBL_ANSWR_ID_LST ,COUNT(d.ADMN_MTHD_FLTR_CRITR_SYS_ID) AS COUNT,d.ADMN_MTHD_FLTR_CRITR_SYS_ID FROM ( select a.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID, m.ADMN_MTHD_DESC, m.ADMN_MTHD_NO,a.PSBL_ANSWR_ID_LST, 1 AS count, a.ADMN_MTHD_FLTR_CRITR_SYS_ID from ADMN_MTHD_FLTR_CRITR a, ADMN_MTHD_MSTR m, (select distinct DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID as DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID from BLN_BNFT_LINE n, BLVL_BNFT_LVL e where n.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = e.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID and e.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID ={1} and

SelectSQLQuery.name: getAdminMethodsForBenefitComponent
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: SELECT d.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID, d.ADMN_MTHD_DESC, d.ADMN_MTHD_NO , d.PSBL_ANSWR_ID_LST ,COUNT(d.ADMN_MTHD_FLTR_CRITR_SYS_ID) AS COUNT,d.ADMN_MTHD_FLTR_CRITR_SYS_ID FROM ( select a.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID, m.ADMN_MTHD_DESC, m.ADMN_MTHD_NO,a.PSBL_ANSWR_ID_LST, 1 AS count, a.ADMN_MTHD_FLTR_CRITR_SYS_ID from ADMN_MTHD_FLTR_CRITR a, ADMN_MTHD_MSTR m, (select distinct DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID as DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID from BNFT_CMPNT_BNFT_CSTMZD p, BLN_BNFT_LINE n, BLVL_BNFT_LVL e where p.BNFT_LVL_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' and p.BNFT_LINE_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' and n.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = p.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID and n.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = p.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID and n.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = p.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID AND e.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = p.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND e.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = p.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID and p.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {1} and p.BNFT_SYS_ID = {2} and

SelectSQLQuery.name: getAdminMethodsForProductStructure
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: SELECT d.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID, d.ADMN_MTHD_DESC, d.ADMN_MTHD_NO , d.PSBL_ANSWR_ID_LST ,COUNT(d.ADMN_MTHD_FLTR_CRITR_SYS_ID) AS COUNT,d.ADMN_MTHD_FLTR_CRITR_SYS_ID FROM ( select a.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID, m.ADMN_MTHD_DESC, m.ADMN_MTHD_NO,a.PSBL_ANSWR_ID_LST, 1 AS count, a.ADMN_MTHD_FLTR_CRITR_SYS_ID from ADMN_MTHD_FLTR_CRITR a, ADMN_MTHD_MSTR m, (select distinct DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID as DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID from PROD_STRCTR_BNFT_CSTMZD p, BLN_BNFT_LINE n, BLVL_BNFT_LVL e where p.BNFT_LVL_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' and p.BNFT_LINE_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' and p.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG='F' and n.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = p.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID and n.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = p.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID and n.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = p.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID AND e.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = p.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND e.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = p.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID and p.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {1} and p.BNFT_SYS_ID = {2} and p.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID = {3} and

SelectSQLQuery.name: getAdminMethodsForProduct
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: SELECT d.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID, d.ADMN_MTHD_DESC, d.ADMN_MTHD_NO , d.PSBL_ANSWR_ID_LST ,COUNT(d.ADMN_MTHD_FLTR_CRITR_SYS_ID) AS COUNT,d.ADMN_MTHD_FLTR_CRITR_SYS_ID FROM ( select e.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID, d.ADMN_MTHD_DESC, d.ADMN_MTHD_NO,e.PSBL_ANSWR_ID_LST, 1 AS count, e.ADMN_MTHD_FLTR_CRITR_SYS_ID from ADMN_MTHD_MSTR d, ADMN_MTHD_FLTR_CRITR e, (select distinct DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID as DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID from PROD_BNFT_CSTMZD a, BLN_BNFT_LINE b, BLVL_BNFT_LVL c where a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID={1} and a.BNFT_SYS_ID= {2} and a.PROD_SYS_ID= {3} and a.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' and a.BNFT_LVL_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' and a.BNFT_LINE_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' and a.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID and a.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID and a.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = b.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID and a.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = b.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID and a.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = c.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID and

SelectSQLQuery.name: getAdminMethodsForTierProduct
getAdminMethodsForContract
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: SELECT D.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID, D.ADMN_MTHD_DESC, D.ADMN_MTHD_NO , D.PSBL_ANSWR_ID_LST , COUNT(D.ADMN_MTHD_FLTR_CRITR_SYS_ID) AS COUNT, D.ADMN_MTHD_FLTR_CRITR_SYS_ID FROM (SELECT E.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID, D.ADMN_MTHD_DESC, D.ADMN_MTHD_NO, E.PSBL_ANSWR_ID_LST, 1 AS COUNT, E.ADMN_MTHD_FLTR_CRITR_SYS_ID FROM ADMN_MTHD_MSTR D, ADMN_MTHD_FLTR_CRITR E, ( SELECT DISTINCT DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID AS DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_CODED_LINES A , CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN CBA, BLN_BNFT_LINE B, BLVL_BNFT_LVL C, ( SELECT DISTINCT A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, A.BNFT_SYS_ID FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN A, BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR B WHERE A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {3} AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID =B.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND B.BNFT_CMPNT_NM ='GENERAL BENEFITS' AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG ='F' AND A.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' ) D, CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT CDS WHERE A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID =CBA.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = CBA.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND A.BNFT_SYS_ID = CBA.BNFT_SYS_ID AND A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = CDS.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND (A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {1} OR A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID =D.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID) AND (A.BNFT_SYS_ID = {2} OR A.BNFT_SYS_ID = D.BNFT_SYS_ID) AND CDS.PROD_SYS_ID = {6} AND A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {3} AND CBA.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND CBA.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND A.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = B.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND A.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = C.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND A.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = B.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID AND A.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = B.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID AND A.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = C.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID AND

SelectSQLQuery.name: getAdminMethodsForTierContract
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: SELECT d.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID, d.ADMN_MTHD_DESC, d.ADMN_MTHD_NO , d.PSBL_ANSWR_ID_LST ,COUNT(d.ADMN_MTHD_FLTR_CRITR_SYS_ID) AS COUNT,d.ADMN_MTHD_FLTR_CRITR_SYS_ID FROM ( select e.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID, d.ADMN_MTHD_DESC, d.ADMN_MTHD_NO,e.PSBL_ANSWR_ID_LST, 1 AS count, e.ADMN_MTHD_FLTR_CRITR_SYS_ID from ADMN_MTHD_MSTR d, ADMN_MTHD_FLTR_CRITR e, ( select distinct DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID FROM ( select distinct DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID as DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID from cntrct_bnft_tier_custmzd a, BLN_BNFT_LINE b, BLVL_BNFT_LVL c, ( select distinct a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, a.bnft_sys_id from CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN A, bcm_bnft_cmpnt_mstr B where a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {3} and a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id =b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id and b.bnft_cmpnt_nm ='GENERAL BENEFITS' and a.bnft_cmpnt_hide_flag ='F' and a.bnft_hide_flag = 'F' ) d where (a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID={1} OR a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID=d.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID) and (a.BNFT_SYS_ID= {2} OR a.BNFT_SYS_ID = d.BNFT_SYS_ID) and a.PROD_SYS_ID= {6} and a.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID= {7} and a.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {3} and a.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' and a.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' and a.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID and a.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID and a.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = b.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID and a.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = b.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID and a.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = c.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID and a.BVAL_BNFT_VAL is not null and

DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT b.ANSWR_ID, dbms_random.random FROM BNFT_QSTNR_ANSWRD b, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN c WHERE b.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = c.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID AND c.BNFT_ADMIN_SYS_ID = {0} GROUP BY b.ANSWR_ID

SELECT b.OVRD_ANSWR_ID, dbms_random.random FROM BNFT_CMPNT_ANSWR_OVRD b, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN c, BNFT_CMPNT_ADMN_OPT_CUSTM d WHERE b.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = c. ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID AND b.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = d.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID AND b.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = d.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND d.ADMIN_OPTION_HIDE_FLAG ='F' AND b.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {1} AND c.BNFT_ADMIN_SYS_ID = {0} GROUP BY b.OVRD_ANSWR_ID

SelectSQLQuery.name: getQuestionForPS
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: SELECT b.ovrd_answr_id, DBMS_RANDOM.random FROM PROD_STRCTR_ANSWR_OVRD b, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN c, PROD_STRCTR_ADMN_OPT_CUSTM g, PROD_STRCTR_BNFT_CSTMZD h WHERE g.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = b.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND c.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = b.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND b.prod_strctr_sys_id = g.prod_strctr_sys_id AND g.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND g.admin_option_hide_flag = 'F' AND b.prod_strctr_sys_id = {1} AND b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = {3} AND c.bnft_admin_sys_id = {0} --AND h.bnft_sys_id = 7731 -- new input AND h.bnft_hide_flag = 'F' AND h.prod_strctr_sys_id = b.prod_strctr_sys_id AND h.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id GROUP BY b.ovrd_answr_id
SelectSQLQuery.DYNAMIC:
UNION
SELECT b.ovrd_answr_id, DBMS_RANDOM.random FROM PROD_STRCTR_ANSWR_OVRD b, (SELECT p.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, p.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID FROM PROD_STRCTR_BNFT_CMPNT_ASSN p, BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR c WHERE p.prod_strctr_sys_id = {1} AND c.bnft_cmpnt_nm = {2} AND p.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = c.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id) q, PROD_STRCTR_ADMN_OPT_CUSTM g, PROD_STRCTR_BNFT_CSTMZD p, (SELECT e.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID FROM PROD_STRCTR_ANSWR_OVRD b, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN c, PROD_STRCTR_ADMN_OPT_CUSTM g, ADMIN_OPT_MSTR e WHERE g.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = b.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND c.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = b.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND g.prod_strctr_sys_id = b.prod_strctr_sys_id AND g.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND g.admin_option_hide_flag = 'F' AND b.prod_strctr_sys_id = {1} AND b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = {3} AND c.bnft_admin_sys_id = {0} AND c.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = e.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID GROUP BY e.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID ) v, ADMIN_OPT_MSTR e, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN k WHERE b.prod_strctr_sys_id = q.prod_strctr_sys_id AND p.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID = q.prod_strctr_sys_id AND p.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = q.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND p.bnft_hide_flag = 'F' AND g.admin_option_hide_flag = 'F' AND g.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = b.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID AND g.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = b.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND g.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID = b.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID AND b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = q.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND b.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = k.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID AND e.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = k.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID AND e.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID = v.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID(+) AND v.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID IS NULL GROUP BY b.ovrd_answr_id

SelectSQLQuery.name: getQuestionForP
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC:
SELECT b.ovrd_answr_id, DBMS_RANDOM.random FROM PROD_ANSWR_OVRD b, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN c, BNFT_ADMNSTRN_ASSN d, PROD_ADMN_OPT_CUSTM g, PROD_BNFT_CSTMZD h WHERE b.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = g.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND c.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = b.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND b.prod_sys_id = g.prod_sys_id AND g.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND c.bnft_admin_sys_id = d.bnft_admin_sys_id AND g.admin_option_hide_flag = 'F' AND b.prod_sys_id = {2} AND b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = {3} AND d.bnft_admin_sys_id = {0} AND h.bnft_hide_flag = 'F' AND h.prod_sys_id = b.prod_sys_id AND h.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id GROUP BY b.ovrd_answr_id
UNION
SELECT D.OVRD_ANSWR_ID, DBMS_RANDOM.random FROM PROD_ADMIN_QSTN_ANSWR_OVRD D WHERE D.PROD_SYS_ID= {2} GROUP BY d.ovrd_answr_id

SelectSQLQuery.name: getQuestionForTierP
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC:
SELECT b.ovrd_answr_id, DBMS_RANDOM.random FROM PROD_TIER_ANSWR_OVRD b, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN c, BNFT_ADMNSTRN_ASSN d, PROD_ADMN_OPT_CUSTM g, PROD_BNFT_CSTMZD h WHERE b.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = g.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND c.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = b.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND b.prod_sys_id = g.prod_sys_id AND b.PROD_TIER_SYS_ID = {4} AND g.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND c.bnft_admin_sys_id = d.bnft_admin_sys_id AND g.admin_option_hide_flag = 'F' AND b.prod_sys_id = {2} AND b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = {3} AND d.bnft_admin_sys_id = {0} AND h.bnft_hide_flag = 'F' AND h.prod_sys_id = b.prod_sys_id AND h.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id GROUP BY b.ovrd_answr_id
UNION
SELECT D.OVRD_ANSWR_ID, DBMS_RANDOM.random FROM PROD_ADMIN_QSTN_ANSWR_OVRD D WHERE D.PROD_SYS_ID= {2} GROUP BY d.ovrd_answr_id
SelectSQLQuery.DYNAMIC:
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT ovrd_answr_id, DBMS_RANDOM.random FROM (
SELECT b.ovrd_answr_id, DBMS_RANDOM.random FROM PROD_TIER_ANSWR_OVRD b, (SELECT a.prod_sys_id, a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id FROM PROD_BNFT_CSTMZD a, BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR b WHERE a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND b.bnft_cmpnt_nm = {1} AND a.prod_sys_id = {2} GROUP BY a.prod_sys_id, a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id) q, PROD_ADMN_OPT_CUSTM g, (
SELECT distinct ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID from (
SELECT distinct e.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID FROM PROD_TIER_ANSWR_OVRD b, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN c, PROD_ADMN_OPT_CUSTM g, ADMIN_OPT_MSTR e , PSBL_ANSWR f WHERE g.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = b.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND c.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = b.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND g.prod_sys_id = b.prod_sys_id AND g.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND g.admin_option_hide_flag = 'F' AND b.prod_sys_id = {2} AND b.PROD_TIER_SYS_ID = {4} AND b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = {3} AND c.bnft_admin_sys_id = {0} AND e.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = c.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID AND f.PSBL_ANSWR_ID = b.ovrd_answr_id AND upper(f.psbl_answr) != 'NOT ANSWERED' ) ) v, PROD_BNFT_TIER_CUSTMZD p, ADMIN_OPT_MSTR e, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN k WHERE b.prod_sys_id = q.prod_sys_id AND p.bnft_hide_flag = 'F' AND g.admin_option_hide_flag = 'F' AND g.PROD_SYS_ID = q.prod_sys_id AND g.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = q.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND g.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = b.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID AND b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = q.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND p.PROD_SYS_ID = q.prod_sys_id AND b.PROD_TIER_SYS_ID = {5} AND p.PROD_TIER_SYS_ID = {5} AND p.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = q.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND b.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = k.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID AND e.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = k.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID AND e.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID = v.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID(+) AND v.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID IS NULL GROUP BY b.ovrd_answr_id )

SelectSQLQuery.name: getQuestionForC
SelectSQLQuery.DYNAMIC:
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT ovrd_answr_id, DBMS_RANDOM.random FROM (
SELECT b.ovrd_answr_id, DBMS_RANDOM.random FROM CNTRCT_ANSWR_OVRD b, ( SELECT a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id, a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN a, BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR b WHERE a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND b.bnft_cmpnt_nm = {2} AND a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {1} GROUP BY a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id, a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id) q, CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN p, ( select distinct ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID from(
SELECT distinct e.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID FROM CNTRCT_ANSWR_OVRD b, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN c, ADMIN_OPT_MSTR e , PSBL_ANSWR f WHERE c.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = b.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND b.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {1} AND b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = {3} AND c.bnft_admin_sys_id = {0} AND c.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = e.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID AND f.PSBL_ANSWR_ID = b.ovrd_answr_id --AND upper(f.psbl_answr) != 'NOT ANSWERED' )
) v, ADMIN_OPT_MSTR e, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN k WHERE b.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = q.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = q.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND p.bnft_hide_flag = 'F' AND p.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND p.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = q.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND p.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = q.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND p.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = k.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID AND b.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = k.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID AND e.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = k.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID AND e.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID = v.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID(+) AND v.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID IS NULL GROUP BY b.ovrd_answr_id )

SelectSQLQuery.name: getQuestionForTierC
SelectSQLQuery.DYNAMIC:
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT ovrd_answr_id, DBMS_RANDOM.random FROM ( SELECT b.ovrd_answr_id, DBMS_RANDOM.random FROM cntrct_tier_answr_ovrd b, ( SELECT a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id, a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN a, BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR b WHERE a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND b.bnft_cmpnt_nm = {2} AND a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {1} GROUP BY a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id, a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id) q, CNTRCT_BNFT_TIER_CUSTMZD p, ( select distinct ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID from(
SELECT distinct e.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID FROM CNTRCT_ANSWR_OVRD b, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN c, ADMIN_OPT_MSTR e , PSBL_ANSWR f WHERE c.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = b.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND b.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {1} AND b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = {3} AND c.bnft_admin_sys_id = {0} AND c.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = e.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID AND f.PSBL_ANSWR_ID = b.ovrd_answr_id --AND upper(f.psbl_answr) != 'NOT ANSWERED'
UNION
SELECT distinct e.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID FROM cntrct_tier_answr_ovrd b, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN c, ADMIN_OPT_MSTR e , PSBL_ANSWR f WHERE c.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = b.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND b.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {1} AND b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = {3} AND c.bnft_admin_sys_id = {0} AND b.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID = {4} AND c.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = e.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID AND f.PSBL_ANSWR_ID = b.ovrd_answr_id --AND upper(f.psbl_answr) != 'NOT ANSWERED'
)
) v, ADMIN_OPT_MSTR e, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN k WHERE b.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = q.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = q.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND b.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID = {5} AND p.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID = {5} AND p.bnft_hide_flag = 'F' AND p.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND p.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = q.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND p.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = q.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND p.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = k.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID AND b.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = k.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID AND e.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = k.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID AND e.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID = v.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID(+) AND v.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID IS NULL GROUP BY b.ovrd_answr_id )

SelectSQLQuery.name: getAdminMethodsForAnswer
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select distinct a.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID, m.ADMN_MTHD_DESC, m.ADMN_MTHD_NO, 5 AS count from ADMN_MTHD_FLTR_CRITR a, ADMN_MTHD_MSTR m where a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID = m.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID and a.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID = m.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID and a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID = {1} and

UNION
select distinct a.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID, b.ADMN_MTHD_DESC, b.ADMN_MTHD_NO, 5 AS count,a.ADMN_MTHD_FLTR_CRITR_SYS_ID from ADMN_MTHD_FLTR_CRITR a,ADMN_MTHD_MSTR b where a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID = {1} and a.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID = b.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID and a.PSBL_ANSWR_ID_LST is null

SelectSQLQuery.name: getAnswerList
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select a.ADMN_MTHD_FLTR_CRITR_SYS_ID,a.PSBL_ANSWR_ID_LST,a.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID, b.ADMN_MTHD_DESC, b.ADMN_MTHD_NO, 5 AS count from ADMN_MTHD_FLTR_CRITR a,ADMN_MTHD_MSTR b where a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID = {0} and a.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID = b.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID and a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID = b.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID and

DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT m.cd_desc_txt , n.psbl_answr, dbms_random.random FROM (SELECT rfrnc_id, d.cd_desc_txt FROM ADMN_MTHD_CNFGRN, ITEM d WHERE admn_mthd_sys_id = {1} AND (rfrnc_id = d.prmry_cd(+) AND d.ctlg_id(+) = 1938)) m LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT q.rfrnc_id, d.cd_desc_txt, e.PSBL_ANSWR FROM BNFT_QSTNR_ANSWRD b, QSTNR_MSTR q, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN f, ITEM d, PSBL_ANSWR e WHERE b.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = f.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND e.psbl_answr_id = b.ANSWR_ID AND q.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID = b.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID AND (q.rfrnc_id = d.prmry_cd(+) AND d.ctlg_id(+) = 1938) AND f.bnft_admin_sys_id = {0} ) n ON m.rfrnc_id = n.rfrnc_id WHERE m.cd_desc_txt IS NOT NULL ORDER BY m.cd_desc_txt

SELECT m.cd_desc_txt, n.psbl_answr, dbms_random.random FROM (SELECT rfrnc_id, d.cd_desc_txt FROM ADMN_MTHD_CNFGRN, ITEM d WHERE admn_mthd_sys_id = {2} AND (rfrnc_id = d.prmry_cd(+) AND d.ctlg_id(+) = 1938)) m LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT distinct q.rfrnc_id,q.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID, f.cd_desc_txt, h.PSBL_ANSWR FROM BNFT_CMPNT_ANSWR_OVRD a, --BNFT_ADMIN_OPT_QSTN_ASSN b, --ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_MSTR c, ITEM f, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN g, PSBL_ANSWR h, QSTNR_MSTR q, BNFT_CMPNT_ADMN_OPT_CUSTM d WHERE q.rfrnc_id = f.prmry_cd(+) AND f.ctlg_id(+) = 1938 --AND b.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr = c.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr --AND b.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = a.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id --AND a.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr = c.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr AND g.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = a.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND a.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID = q.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID AND d.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND d.ADMIN_OPTION_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND g.bnft_admin_sys_id = {1} AND h.psbl_answr_id = a.OVRD_ANSWR_ID AND a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id ={0}) n ON m.rfrnc_id = n.rfrnc_id WHERE m.cd_desc_txt IS NOT NULL ORDER BY m.cd_desc_txt

SelectSQLQuery.name: getAdminConfigForProductStructure
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: SELECT m.cd_desc_txt, n.PSBL_ANSWR, dbms_random.random FROM (SELECT rfrnc_id, d.cd_desc_txt FROM ADMN_MTHD_CNFGRN, ITEM d WHERE admn_mthd_sys_id = {3} AND (rfrnc_id = d.prmry_cd(+) AND d.ctlg_id(+) = 1938)) m LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT q.rfrnc_id, f.cd_desc_txt, h.PSBL_ANSWR FROM PROD_STRCTR_ANSWR_OVRD a, PROD_STRCTR_ADMN_OPT_CUSTM d, ITEM f, QSTNR_MSTR q, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN g, PSBL_ANSWR h WHERE q.rfrnc_id = f.prmry_cd(+) AND f.ctlg_id(+) = 1938 AND g.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = a.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND d.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = a.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND g.bnft_admin_sys_id = {0} AND a.ovrd_answr_id = h.psbl_answr_id AND d.admin_option_hide_flag = 'F' AND a.prod_strctr_sys_id = {1} AND a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = {2} AND a.prod_strctr_sys_id = d.prod_strctr_sys_id AND a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = d.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND q.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID = a.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID
SelectSQLQuery.DYNAMIC: UNION SELECT q.rfrnc_id,f.cd_desc_txt,h.PSBL_ANSWR FROM PROD_STRCTR_ANSWR_OVRD a, PROD_STRCTR_ADMN_OPT_CUSTM d, ITEM f, QSTNR_MSTR q, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN g, PSBL_ANSWR h, (SELECT e.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID FROM PROD_STRCTR_ANSWR_OVRD b, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN c, PROD_STRCTR_ADMN_OPT_CUSTM g, ADMIN_OPT_MSTR e WHERE b.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = g.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND c.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = b.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND b.prod_strctr_sys_id = g.prod_strctr_sys_id AND g.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND g.admin_option_hide_flag = 'F' AND b.prod_strctr_sys_id = {1} AND b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = {2} AND c.bnft_admin_sys_id = {0} AND c.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = e.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID group by e.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID) v, ADMIN_OPT_MSTR e, (SELECT DISTINCT p.prod_strctr_sys_id, p.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id FROM PROD_STRCTR_BNFT_CSTMZD p, BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR c WHERE p.prod_strctr_sys_id = {1} AND c.bnft_cmpnt_nm = {4} AND p.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = c.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id) q WHERE q.rfrnc_id = f.prmry_cd(+) AND f.ctlg_id(+) = 1938 AND g.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = a.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID AND q.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID = a.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID AND a.ovrd_answr_id = h.psbl_answr_id AND d.admin_option_hide_flag = 'F' AND d.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID = a.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID AND d.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND a.prod_strctr_sys_id = {1} AND a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = q.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND g.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = e.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID AND E.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID = v.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID(+) AND v.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID is null

SelectSQLQuery.name: getAdminConfigForProduct
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC:
SELECT m.cd_desc_txt, n.PSBL_ANSWR, dbms_random.random FROM (SELECT rfrnc_id, d.cd_desc_txt FROM ADMN_MTHD_CNFGRN, ITEM d WHERE admn_mthd_sys_id = {3} AND (rfrnc_id = d.prmry_cd(+) AND d.ctlg_id(+) = 1938)) m LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT q.rfrnc_id, f.cd_desc_txt, h.PSBL_ANSWR FROM PROD_ANSWR_OVRD a, PROD_ADMN_OPT_CUSTM d, ITEM f, QSTNR_MSTR q, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN g, PSBL_ANSWR h WHERE q.rfrnc_id = f.prmry_cd(+) AND f.ctlg_id(+) = 1938 AND g.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = a.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND d.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = a.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND g.bnft_admin_sys_id = {2} AND q.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID = a.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID AND a.ovrd_answr_id = h.psbl_answr_id AND d.admin_option_hide_flag = 'F' AND a.PROD_SYS_ID = {0} AND a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = {1} AND a.PROD_SYS_ID = d.PROD_SYS_ID AND a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = d.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id
UNION
SELECT q.RFRNC_ID, f.cd_desc_txt, h.PSBL_ANSWR FROM PROD_ADMIN_QSTN_ANSWR_OVRD d, PSBL_ANSWR h, ITEM f, QSTNR_MSTR q WHERE d.PROD_SYS_ID = {0} AND q.RFRNC_ID = f.prmry_cd(+) AND f.ctlg_id(+) = 1938 AND q.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID = d.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID AND d.OVRD_ANSWR_ID = h.PSBL_ANSWR_ID
SelectSQLQuery.DYNAMIC:
UNION
SELECT l.rfrnc_id,f.cd_desc_txt,h.PSBL_ANSWR FROM PROD_ANSWR_OVRD a, QSTNR_MSTR l, PROD_ADMN_OPT_CUSTM d, ITEM f, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN g, PSBL_ANSWR h, (SELECT e.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID FROM PROD_ANSWR_OVRD b, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN c, PROD_ADMN_OPT_CUSTM g, ADMIN_OPT_MSTR e WHERE b.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = g.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND c.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = b.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND b.prod_sys_id = g.prod_sys_id AND g.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND g.admin_option_hide_flag = 'F' AND b.prod_sys_id = {0} AND b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = {1} AND c.bnft_admin_sys_id = {2} AND c.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = e.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID group by e.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID) v, ADMIN_OPT_MSTR e, (SELECT DISTINCT p.prod_sys_id, p.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id FROM PROD_BNFT_CSTMZD p, BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR c WHERE p.prod_sys_id = {0} AND c.bnft_cmpnt_nm = {4} AND p.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = c.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id) q WHERE l.rfrnc_id = f.prmry_cd(+) AND f.ctlg_id(+) = 1938 AND g.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = a.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND l.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID = a.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID AND a.ovrd_answr_id = h.psbl_answr_id AND d.admin_option_hide_flag = 'F' AND a.prod_sys_id = {0} AND d.prod_sys_id = a.prod_sys_id AND d.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = q.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND g.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = e.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID AND E.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID = v.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID(+) AND v.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID is null
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: ) n ON m.rfrnc_id = n.rfrnc_id WHERE m.cd_desc_txt IS NOT NULL ORDER BY m.cd_desc_txt

SelectSQLQuery.name: getAdminConfigForContract
SelectSQLQuery.DYNAMIC:
UNION
SELECT l.rfrnc_id, f.cd_desc_txt, h.PSBL_ANSWR FROM CNTRCT_ANSWR_OVRD a, ITEM f, QSTNR_MSTR l, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN g, (SELECT e.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID FROM CNTRCT_ANSWR_OVRD b, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN c, ADMIN_OPT_MSTR e WHERE c.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = b.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND b.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {1} AND b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = {2} AND c.bnft_admin_sys_id = {0} AND c.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = e.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID group by e.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID) v, PSBL_ANSWR h, ADMIN_OPT_MSTR e, (SELECT DISTINCT p.dt_sgmnt_sys_id, p.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN p, BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR c WHERE p.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {1} AND c.bnft_cmpnt_nm = {4} AND p.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = c.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id) q WHERE l.rfrnc_id = f.prmry_cd(+) AND f.ctlg_id(+) = 1938 AND g.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = a.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND a.ovrd_answr_id = h.psbl_answr_id AND a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {1} AND l.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID = a.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID AND a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = q.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND g.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = e.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID AND E.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID = v.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID(+) AND v.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID is null

SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: AND a.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID = m.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID AND s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID = a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID AND a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID = m.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID AND A.ENTY_SYS_ID = S.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND A.enty_TIER_SYS_ID = S.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID AND S.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID = R.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID AND S.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID = T.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID AND T.TIER_CRTRIA_SYS_ID = U.TIER_CRTRIA_SYS_ID AND R.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID = U.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID UNION SELECT DISTINCT s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID, s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_NM, s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_REF,s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_REF_ID, NULL , '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL FROM SPR_PRCSS_STP_MSTR s WHERE s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID NOT IN (SELECT SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID FROM ADMN_MTHD_OVRD a WHERE a.ENTY_SYS_ID = {0} AND a.ENTY_TYPE = {1} AND a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {3} AND a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID = {2}) )nn WHERE nn.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY SPR_PRCSS_STP_NM

SELECT DISTINCT B.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA , DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_CODED_LINES A, CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN CBA, BLN_BNFT_LINE B, ( SELECT DISTINCT A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, A.BNFT_SYS_ID FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN A, BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR B WHERE A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID =B.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND B.BNFT_CMPNT_NM ='GENERAL BENEFITS' AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG ='F' AND A.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' ) D WHERE A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = CBA.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = CBA.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND A.BNFT_SYS_ID = CBA.BNFT_SYS_ID AND (A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {1} OR A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID =D.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID) AND (A.BNFT_SYS_ID = {2} OR A.BNFT_SYS_ID =D.BNFT_SYS_ID) AND A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} AND CBA.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND CBA.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND A.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = B.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND A.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = B.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID AND A.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = B.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID

DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID FROM PROD_BNFT_SPS_VALDN WHERE ENTY_SYS_ID = ?

SELECT DISTINCT a.ENTY_SYS_ID, TO_CHAR(d.DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT,'mm/dd/yyyy'), TO_CHAR(d.DT_SGMNT_EXPR_DT,'mm/dd/yyyy'), 0 AS BenefitId, 0 AS spsId, 0 AS AdministrationId FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_AFFCTD_SPS a , BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR c , CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN b, CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT d , CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN e, spr_prcss_stp_mstr spr WHERE a.ENTY_SYS_ID =d.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = c.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND SPS_VALDN_FLAG ='I' AND a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = b.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND b.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND b.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND a.ENTY_SYS_ID = b.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND a.bnft_sys_id = b.bnft_sys_id AND (d.DT_SGMNT_STTS_CD ='CHECKED_OUT' OR d.DT_SGMNT_STTS_CD ='BUILDING') AND a.PRCSS_RUNNING_FLAG ='E' AND a.PRCSS_REPEAT_FLAG = 'F' AND e.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = d.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND e.CNTRCT_SYS_ID ={0} AND spr.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id= a.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id AND spr.prod_family IN (SELECT column_value FROM TABLE(CAST(STR2TBL( (SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN prod_fmly_nm = 'POS' THEN 'HMO,PPO' WHEN prod_fmly_nm = 'HMO' THEN 'HMO' ELSE 'PPO' END FROM prod_mstr WHERE prod_sys_id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT d.prod_sys_id FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_AFFCTD_SPS a , BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR c , CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN b, CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT d , CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN e, spr_prcss_stp_mstr spr WHERE a.ENTY_SYS_ID =d.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = c.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND SPS_VALDN_FLAG ='I' AND a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = b.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND b.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND b.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND a.ENTY_SYS_ID = b.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND a.bnft_sys_id = b.bnft_sys_id AND (d.DT_SGMNT_STTS_CD ='CHECKED_OUT' OR d.DT_SGMNT_STTS_CD ='BUILDING') AND a.PRCSS_RUNNING_FLAG ='E' AND a.PRCSS_REPEAT_FLAG = 'F' AND e.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = d.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND e.CNTRCT_SYS_ID ={0} AND spr.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id= a.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id ) ) ) AS nt_varchar2)) )

SELECT DISTINCT A.ENTY_SYS_ID, TO_CHAR(C.DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT,'mm/dd/yyyy'), TO_CHAR(C.DT_SGMNT_EXPR_DT,'mm/dd/yyyy'), 0 AS BENEFITID, 0 AS SPSID, 0 AS ADMINISTRATIONID , A.PROD_SYS_ID FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_AFFCTD_SPS A, CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN B, CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT C, CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN D , CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT CDS, SPR_PRCSS_STP_MSTR SPR WHERE D.CNTRCT_SYS_ID ={0} AND C.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = D.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND B.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = CDS.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND A.ENTY_SYS_ID =C.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND B.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = A.ENTY_SYS_ID AND CDS.PROD_SYS_ID = A.PROD_SYS_ID AND B.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND B.BNFT_SYS_ID = A.BNFT_SYS_ID AND B.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND B.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND A.PRCSS_RUNNING_FLAG ='E' AND A.PRCSS_REPEAT_FLAG = 'F' AND A.SPS_VALDN_FLAG ='P' AND SPR.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID= A.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID AND SPR.PROD_FAMILY IN (SELECT COLUMN_VALUE FROM TABLE(CAST(STR2TBL( (SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN PROD_FMLY_NM = 'POS' THEN 'HMO,PPO' WHEN PROD_FMLY_NM = 'HMO' THEN 'HMO' ELSE 'PPO' END FROM PROD_MSTR WHERE PROD_SYS_ID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT C.PROD_SYS_ID FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_AFFCTD_SPS A, CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN B, CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT C, CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN D , CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT CDS, SPR_PRCSS_STP_MSTR SPR WHERE D.CNTRCT_SYS_ID = {0} AND B.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = CDS.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND C.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = D.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND A.ENTY_SYS_ID =C.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND B.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = A.ENTY_SYS_ID AND CDS.PROD_SYS_ID = A.PROD_SYS_ID AND B.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND B.BNFT_SYS_ID = A.BNFT_SYS_ID AND B.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND B.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND A.PRCSS_RUNNING_FLAG ='E' AND A.PRCSS_REPEAT_FLAG = 'F' AND A.SPS_VALDN_FLAG ='P' AND SPR.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID= A.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID ) ) ) AS NT_VARCHAR2)) )

select distinct a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID,c.BNFT_CMPNT_NM,a.ENTY_SYS_ID,0 as BenefitId,0 as spsId,0 as AdministrationId, e.SQNC_NBR as ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID from PROD_BNFT_AFFCTD_SPS a , BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR c,PROD_BNFT_CSTMZD d, PROD_BNFT_CMPNT_ASSN e where a.ENTY_SYS_ID = {0} and a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = c.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID and SPS_VALDN_FLAG ='I' AND a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = e.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND a.ENTY_SYS_ID = e.PROD_SYS_ID and a.BNFT_SYS_ID = d.BNFT_SYS_ID and a.ENTY_SYS_ID = d.PROD_SYS_ID and a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = d.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID and d.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG ='F' and a.PRCSS_RUNNING_FLAG='E' and a.PRCSS_REPEAT_FLAG = 'F' order by e.SQNC_NBR

select distinct a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID,c.BNFT_CMPNT_NM,a.ENTY_SYS_ID,0 as BenefitId,0 as spsId,0 as AdministrationId, e.SQNC_NBR as ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID from PROD_STRCTR_BNFT_AFFCTD_SPS a , BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR c,PROD_STRCTR_BNFT_CSTMZD d, PROD_STRCTR_BNFT_CMPNT_ASSN e where a.ENTY_SYS_ID = {0} and a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = c.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID and SPS_VALDN_FLAG ='I' AND e.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND e.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID = a.ENTY_SYS_ID and a.BNFT_SYS_ID = d.BNFT_SYS_ID and a.ENTY_SYS_ID = d.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID and a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = d.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID and d.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG ='F' and a.PRCSS_RUNNING_FLAG='E' and a.PRCSS_REPEAT_FLAG = 'F' order by e.SQNC_NBR

SELECT BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, BNFT_CMPNT_NM, ENTY_SYS_ID, 0 AS BenefitId, 0 AS spsId, 0 AS AdministrationId, ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID FROM (SELECT DISTINCT a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, c.BNFT_CMPNT_NM, a.ENTY_SYS_ID, 0 AS BenefitId, 0 AS spsId, 0 AS AdministrationId, d.SQNC_NBR AS ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID , a.bnft_sys_id, spr.prod_family FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_AFFCTD_SPS a , BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR c , CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN b, PROD_BNFT_CMPNT_ASSN d, spr_prcss_stp_mstr spr WHERE a.ENTY_SYS_ID = {0} AND a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = c.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND SPS_VALDN_FLAG ='I' AND a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = b.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND b.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND b.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND a.ENTY_SYS_ID = b.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND a.bnft_sys_id = b.bnft_sys_id AND a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = d.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND a.PROD_SYS_ID = d.PROD_SYS_ID AND a.PRCSS_RUNNING_FLAG ='E' AND a.PRCSS_REPEAT_FLAG = 'F' AND spr.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id= a.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id ) Q WHERE Q.prod_family IN (SELECT column_value FROM TABLE(CAST(Str2tbl(GET_PRD_FAMILY({0},Q.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID,Q.bnft_sys_id,'','')) AS nt_varchar2)) ) ORDER BY Q.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID

SELECT BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, BNFT_CMPNT_NM, ENTY_SYS_ID, 0 AS BenefitId, 0 AS spsId, 0 AS AdministrationId, ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, c.BNFT_CMPNT_NM, a.ENTY_SYS_ID, 0 AS BenefitId, 0 AS spsId, 0 AS AdministrationId, d.SQNC_NBR AS ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID , spr.prod_family , a.bnft_sys_id FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_AFFCTD_SPS a , BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR c , CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN b, PROD_BNFT_CMPNT_ASSN d, spr_prcss_stp_mstr spr WHERE a.ENTY_SYS_ID = {0} AND a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = c.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND a.SPS_VALDN_FLAG ='P' AND a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = b.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND b.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND b.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND a.ENTY_SYS_ID = b.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND a.bnft_sys_id = b.bnft_sys_id AND a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = d.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND a.PROD_SYS_ID = d.PROD_SYS_ID AND a.PRCSS_RUNNING_FLAG ='E' AND a.PRCSS_REPEAT_FLAG = 'F' AND A.sps_valdn_flag ='P' AND spr.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id= a.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id ) Q WHERE Q.prod_family IN (SELECT column_value FROM TABLE(CAST(Str2tbl(GET_PRD_FAMILY({0},Q.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID,Q.bnft_sys_id,'','')) AS nt_varchar2)) ) ORDER BY Q.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID

SELECT BNFT_SYS_ID, BNFT_ID_NM, BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, ENTY_SYS_ID, 0 AS spsId, 0 AS AdministrationId, ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT a.BNFT_SYS_ID, b.BNFT_ID_NM, a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, a.ENTY_SYS_ID, 0 AS spsId, 0 AS AdministrationId, d.SQNC_NBR AS ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID , spr.prod_family FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_AFFCTD_SPS a , BMST_BNFT_MSTR b , CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN c, BNFT_CMPNT_HRCHY_ASSN d , spr_prcss_stp_mstr spr WHERE a.ENTY_SYS_ID ={0} AND a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID ={1} AND SPS_VALDN_FLAG ='I' AND d.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND a.BNFT_SYS_ID = d.BNFT_SYS_ID AND a.BNFT_SYS_ID = c.BNFT_SYS_ID AND c.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND a.BNFT_SYS_ID = b.BNFT_SYS_ID AND c.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = a.ENTY_SYS_ID AND c.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND a.PRCSS_RUNNING_FLAG ='E' AND a.PRCSS_REPEAT_FLAG = 'F' AND spr.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id= a.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id ) Q WHERE Q.prod_family IN (SELECT column_value FROM TABLE(CAST(Str2tbl(GET_PRD_FAMILY({0},{1},Q.bnft_sys_id,'','')) AS nt_varchar2)) ) ORDER BY Q.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID

SELECT BNFT_SYS_ID, BNFT_ID_NM, BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, ENTY_SYS_ID, 0 AS spsId, BNFT_ADMTN_ID, ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT a.BNFT_SYS_ID, b.BNFT_ID_NM, a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, a.ENTY_SYS_ID, 0 AS spsId, a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID, d.SQNC_NBR AS ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID , spr.prod_family FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_AFFCTD_SPS a , BMST_BNFT_MSTR b , CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN c, BNFT_CMPNT_HRCHY_ASSN d , spr_prcss_stp_mstr spr WHERE a.ENTY_SYS_ID ={0} AND a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID ={1} AND SPS_VALDN_FLAG ='P' AND d.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND a.BNFT_SYS_ID = d.BNFT_SYS_ID AND a.BNFT_SYS_ID = c.BNFT_SYS_ID AND c.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND a.BNFT_SYS_ID = b.BNFT_SYS_ID AND c.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = a.ENTY_SYS_ID AND c.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND a.PRCSS_RUNNING_FLAG ='E' AND a.PRCSS_REPEAT_FLAG = 'F' AND spr.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id= a.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id ) Q WHERE Q.prod_family IN (SELECT column_value FROM TABLE(CAST(Str2tbl(GET_PRD_FAMILY({0},{1},Q.bnft_sys_id,'','')) AS nt_varchar2)) ) ORDER BY Q.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID

select distinct a.BNFT_SYS_ID,b.BNFT_ID_NM,a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID,a.ENTY_SYS_ID,0 as spsId,0 as AdministrationId, d.SQNC_NBR as ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID from PROD_BNFT_AFFCTD_SPS a , BMST_BNFT_MSTR b, PROD_BNFT_CSTMZD c, BNFT_CMPNT_HRCHY_ASSN d where a.ENTY_SYS_ID ={0} and a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID ={1} and SPS_VALDN_FLAG ='I' and d.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID and a.BNFT_SYS_ID = d.BNFT_SYS_ID and a.BNFT_SYS_ID = b.BNFT_SYS_ID and a.BNFT_SYS_ID = c.BNFT_SYS_ID and c.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG ='F' and a.ENTY_SYS_ID = c.PROD_SYS_ID and a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = c.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID and a.PRCSS_RUNNING_FLAG='E' and a.PRCSS_REPEAT_FLAG = 'F' order by d.SQNC_NBR

select distinct a.BNFT_SYS_ID,b.BNFT_ID_NM,a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID,a.ENTY_SYS_ID,0 as spsId,0 as AdministrationId, d.SQNC_NBR as ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID from PROD_STRCTR_BNFT_AFFCTD_SPS a , BMST_BNFT_MSTR b ,PROD_STRCTR_BNFT_CSTMZD c, BNFT_CMPNT_HRCHY_ASSN d where a.ENTY_SYS_ID ={0} and a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID ={1} and SPS_VALDN_FLAG ='I' and d.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID and a.BNFT_SYS_ID = d.BNFT_SYS_ID and a.BNFT_SYS_ID = b.BNFT_SYS_ID and a.BNFT_SYS_ID = c.BNFT_SYS_ID and c.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG ='F' and a.ENTY_SYS_ID = c.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID and a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = c.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID and a.PRCSS_RUNNING_FLAG='E' and a.PRCSS_REPEAT_FLAG = 'F' order by d.SQNC_NBR

(select a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID,to_char(b.BNFT_ADMIN_EFCTV_DT,'mm/dd/yyyy'),to_char(b.BNFT_ADMIN_EXPIRY_DT,'mm/dd/yyyy') , a.BNFT_SYS_ID,a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID,a.ENTY_SYS_ID,a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID,c.SPR_PRCSS_STP_NM , 'product', e.ADMN_MTHD_DESC , e.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID ,'PPO' from PROD_BNFT_AFFCTD_SPS a , BNFT_ADMNSTRN_ASSN b ,SPR_PRCSS_STP_MSTR c, ADMN_MTHD_OVRD d, ADMN_MTHD_MSTR e where a.ENTY_SYS_ID ={0} and a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID ={1} and SPS_VALDN_FLAG ='I' AND d.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID = e.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID and a.BNFT_SYS_ID ={2} and a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID = b.BNFT_ADMIN_SYS_ID AND a.ENTY_SYS_ID = d.ENTY_SYS_ID AND d.ENTY_TYPE = 'product' AND a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID=d.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID AND d.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID= d.BNFT_ADMTN_ID and c.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID = a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID and a.PRCSS_RUNNING_FLAG='E' and a.PRCSS_REPEAT_FLAG = 'F' and 1 > a.prod_tier_sys_id union select a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID,to_char(b.BNFT_ADMIN_EFCTV_DT,'mm/dd/yyyy'),to_char(b.BNFT_ADMIN_EXPIRY_DT,'mm/dd/yyyy') , a.BNFT_SYS_ID,a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID,a.ENTY_SYS_ID,a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID,c.SPR_PRCSS_STP_NM , 'product', '', 0 ,'PPO' from PROD_BNFT_AFFCTD_SPS a , BNFT_ADMNSTRN_ASSN b ,SPR_PRCSS_STP_MSTR c where a.ENTY_SYS_ID ={0} and a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID ={1} and SPS_VALDN_FLAG ='I' and a.BNFT_SYS_ID ={2} and a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID = b.BNFT_ADMIN_SYS_ID and c.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID = a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID and a.PRCSS_RUNNING_FLAG='E' and a.PRCSS_REPEAT_FLAG = 'F' and 1 > a.prod_tier_sys_id) order by 1 asc

(select a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID,to_char(b.BNFT_ADMIN_EFCTV_DT,'mm/dd/yyyy'),to_char(b.BNFT_ADMIN_EXPIRY_DT,'mm/dd/yyyy') , a.BNFT_SYS_ID,a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID,a.ENTY_SYS_ID,a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID,c.SPR_PRCSS_STP_NM , 'product', e.ADMN_MTHD_DESC , e.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID, a.PROD_TIER_SYS_ID from PROD_BNFT_AFFCTD_SPS a , BNFT_ADMNSTRN_ASSN b ,SPR_PRCSS_STP_MSTR c, ADMN_MTHD_TIER_OVRD d, ADMN_MTHD_MSTR e where a.ENTY_SYS_ID ={0} and a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID ={1} and SPS_VALDN_FLAG ='I' AND d.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID = e.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID and a.BNFT_SYS_ID ={2} and a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID = b.BNFT_ADMIN_SYS_ID AND a.ENTY_SYS_ID = d.ENTY_SYS_ID AND d.ENTY_TYPE = 'product' AND a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID=d.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID AND d.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID= d.BNFT_ADMTN_ID and c.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID = a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID and a.PRCSS_RUNNING_FLAG='E' and a.PRCSS_REPEAT_FLAG = 'F' and a.PROD_TIER_SYS_ID>0 union select a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID,to_char(b.BNFT_ADMIN_EFCTV_DT,'mm/dd/yyyy'),to_char(b.BNFT_ADMIN_EXPIRY_DT,'mm/dd/yyyy') , a.BNFT_SYS_ID,a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID,a.ENTY_SYS_ID,a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID,c.SPR_PRCSS_STP_NM , 'product', '', 0, a.PROD_TIER_SYS_ID from PROD_BNFT_AFFCTD_SPS a , BNFT_ADMNSTRN_ASSN b ,SPR_PRCSS_STP_MSTR c where a.ENTY_SYS_ID ={0} and a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID ={1} and SPS_VALDN_FLAG ='I' and a.BNFT_SYS_ID ={2} and a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID = b.BNFT_ADMIN_SYS_ID and c.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID = a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID and a.PRCSS_RUNNING_FLAG='E' and a.PRCSS_REPEAT_FLAG = 'F' and a.PROD_TIER_SYS_ID>0) order by 1 asc

(select a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID,to_char(b.BNFT_ADMIN_EFCTV_DT,'mm/dd/yyyy'),to_char(b.BNFT_ADMIN_EXPIRY_DT,'mm/dd/yyyy') , a.BNFT_SYS_ID,a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID,a.ENTY_SYS_ID,a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID,c.SPR_PRCSS_STP_NM, 'prodstructure', e.ADMN_MTHD_DESC , e.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID from PROD_STRCTR_BNFT_AFFCTD_SPS a , BNFT_ADMNSTRN_ASSN b ,SPR_PRCSS_STP_MSTR c, ADMN_MTHD_OVRD d, ADMN_MTHD_MSTR e where a.ENTY_SYS_ID ={0} and a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID ={1} and SPS_VALDN_FLAG ='I' AND d.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID = e.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID and a.BNFT_SYS_ID ={2} and a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID = b.BNFT_ADMIN_SYS_ID AND a.ENTY_SYS_ID = d.ENTY_SYS_ID AND d.ENTY_TYPE = 'ProdStructure' AND a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID=d.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID AND d.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID= d.BNFT_ADMTN_ID and c.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID = a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID and a.PRCSS_RUNNING_FLAG='E' and a.PRCSS_REPEAT_FLAG = 'F' union select a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID,to_char(b.BNFT_ADMIN_EFCTV_DT,'mm/dd/yyyy'),to_char(b.BNFT_ADMIN_EXPIRY_DT,'mm/dd/yyyy') , a.BNFT_SYS_ID,a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID,a.ENTY_SYS_ID,a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID,c.SPR_PRCSS_STP_NM, 'prodstructure', '', 0 from PROD_STRCTR_BNFT_AFFCTD_SPS a , BNFT_ADMNSTRN_ASSN b ,SPR_PRCSS_STP_MSTR c where a.ENTY_SYS_ID ={0} and a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID ={1} and SPS_VALDN_FLAG ='I' and a.BNFT_SYS_ID ={2} and a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID = b.BNFT_ADMIN_SYS_ID and c.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID = a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID and a.PRCSS_RUNNING_FLAG='E' and a.PRCSS_REPEAT_FLAG = 'F') order by 1 asc

(select a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID,to_char(b.BNFT_ADMIN_EFCTV_DT,'mm/dd/yyyy'),to_char(b.BNFT_ADMIN_EXPIRY_DT,'mm/dd/yyyy') , a.BNFT_SYS_ID,a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID,a.ENTY_SYS_ID,a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID,c.SPR_PRCSS_STP_NM, 'contract', e.ADMN_MTHD_DESC, e.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID, c.prod_family from CNTRCT_BNFT_AFFCTD_SPS a , BNFT_ADMNSTRN_ASSN b ,SPR_PRCSS_STP_MSTR c, ADMN_MTHD_OVRD d, ADMN_MTHD_MSTR e where a.ENTY_SYS_ID ={0} and a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID ={1} and SPS_VALDN_FLAG ='I' AND d.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID = e.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID and a.BNFT_SYS_ID ={2} and a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID = b.BNFT_ADMIN_SYS_ID AND a.ENTY_SYS_ID = d.ENTY_SYS_ID AND d.ENTY_TYPE = 'contract' AND a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID=d.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID AND d.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID= d.BNFT_ADMTN_ID and c.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID = a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID and a.PRCSS_RUNNING_FLAG='E' and a.PRCSS_REPEAT_FLAG = 'F' and 1 > a.cntrct_tier_sys_id and c.prod_family in (SELECT column_value FROM TABLE(CAST(Str2tbl(GET_PRD_FAMILY({0},{1},{2},'','')) AS nt_varchar2)))
union select a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID,to_char(b.BNFT_ADMIN_EFCTV_DT,'mm/dd/yyyy'),to_char(b.BNFT_ADMIN_EXPIRY_DT,'mm/dd/yyyy') , a.BNFT_SYS_ID,a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID,a.ENTY_SYS_ID,a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID,c.SPR_PRCSS_STP_NM, 'contract', '', 0 , c.prod_family from CNTRCT_BNFT_AFFCTD_SPS a , BNFT_ADMNSTRN_ASSN b ,SPR_PRCSS_STP_MSTR c where a.ENTY_SYS_ID ={0} and a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID ={1} and SPS_VALDN_FLAG ='I' and a.BNFT_SYS_ID ={2} and a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID = b.BNFT_ADMIN_SYS_ID and c.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID = a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID and a.PRCSS_RUNNING_FLAG='E' and a.PRCSS_REPEAT_FLAG = 'F' and 1 > a.cntrct_tier_sys_id and c.prod_family in (SELECT column_value FROM TABLE(CAST(Str2tbl(GET_PRD_FAMILY({0},{1},{2},'','')) AS nt_varchar2))) ) order by 1 asc

(select a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID,to_char(b.BNFT_ADMIN_EFCTV_DT,'mm/dd/yyyy'),to_char(b.BNFT_ADMIN_EXPIRY_DT,'mm/dd/yyyy') , a.BNFT_SYS_ID,a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID,a.ENTY_SYS_ID,a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID,c.SPR_PRCSS_STP_NM, 'contract', e.ADMN_MTHD_DESC, e.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID, a.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID, c.prod_family from CNTRCT_BNFT_AFFCTD_SPS a , BNFT_ADMNSTRN_ASSN b ,SPR_PRCSS_STP_MSTR c, ADMN_MTHD_TIER_OVRD d, ADMN_MTHD_MSTR e where a.ENTY_SYS_ID ={0} and a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID ={1} and SPS_VALDN_FLAG ='I' AND d.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID = e.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID and a.BNFT_SYS_ID ={2} and a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID = b.BNFT_ADMIN_SYS_ID AND a.ENTY_SYS_ID = d.ENTY_SYS_ID AND d.ENTY_TYPE = 'contract' and d.enty_tier_sys_id= a.cntrct_tier_sys_id AND a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID=d.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID AND d.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID= d.BNFT_ADMTN_ID and c.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID = a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID and a.PRCSS_RUNNING_FLAG='E' and a.PRCSS_REPEAT_FLAG = 'F' and a.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID>0 and c.prod_family in (SELECT column_value FROM TABLE(CAST(Str2tbl(GET_PRD_FAMILY({0},{1},{2},'','')) AS nt_varchar2))) union select a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID,to_char(b.BNFT_ADMIN_EFCTV_DT,'mm/dd/yyyy'),to_char(b.BNFT_ADMIN_EXPIRY_DT,'mm/dd/yyyy') , a.BNFT_SYS_ID,a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID,a.ENTY_SYS_ID,a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID,c.SPR_PRCSS_STP_NM, 'contract', '', 0, a.cntrct_tier_sys_id, c.prod_family from CNTRCT_BNFT_AFFCTD_SPS a , BNFT_ADMNSTRN_ASSN b ,SPR_PRCSS_STP_MSTR c,ADMN_MTHD_TIER_OVRD d where a.ENTY_SYS_ID ={0} and a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID ={1} and SPS_VALDN_FLAG ='I' and d.enty_tier_sys_id= a.cntrct_tier_sys_id and a.BNFT_SYS_ID ={2} and a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID = b.BNFT_ADMIN_SYS_ID and c.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID = a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID and a.PRCSS_RUNNING_FLAG='E' and a.PRCSS_REPEAT_FLAG = 'F' and a.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID>0 and c.prod_family in (SELECT column_value FROM TABLE(CAST(Str2tbl(GET_PRD_FAMILY({0},{1},{2},'','')) AS nt_varchar2))) ) order by 1 asc

SELECT a.SPS_VALDN_FLAG, dbms_random.random FROM PROD_BNFT_AFFCTD_SPS a,PROD_BNFT_CSTMZD b WHERE a.ENTY_SYS_ID = {0} AND b.PROD_SYS_ID =a.ENTY_SYS_ID AND a.SPS_VALDN_FLAG = 'I' and a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID=b.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND a.BNFT_SYS_ID =b.BNFT_SYS_ID and a.PRCSS_RUNNING_FLAG = 'E' and a.PRCSS_REPEAT_FLAG = 'F' AND b.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG='F' group by a.SPS_VALDN_FLAG

SELECT a.SPS_VALDN_FLAG, dbms_random.random FROM PROD_STRCTR_BNFT_AFFCTD_SPS a,PROD_STRCTR_BNFT_CSTMZD b WHERE a.ENTY_SYS_ID = {0} AND b.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID = a.ENTY_SYS_ID and a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID=b.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND a.BNFT_SYS_ID =b.BNFT_SYS_ID AND a.SPS_VALDN_FLAG = 'I' and a.PRCSS_RUNNING_FLAG = 'E' and a.PRCSS_REPEAT_FLAG = 'F' AND b.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG='F' group by a.SPS_VALDN_FLAG

SELECT a.SPS_VALDN_FLAG, COUNT(a.SPS_VALDN_FLAG) FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_AFFCTD_SPS a, CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN b , cntrct_dt_sgmnt C , cntrct_dt_sgmnt_assn D , spr_prcss_stp_mstr spr WHERE D.cntrct_sys_id = {0} AND D.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = C.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND a.ENTY_SYS_ID = C.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND a.ENTY_SYS_ID = b.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND a.SPS_VALDN_FLAG = 'I' AND a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID =b.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND a.BNFT_SYS_ID =b.BNFT_SYS_ID AND a.PRCSS_RUNNING_FLAG = 'E' AND a.PRCSS_REPEAT_FLAG = 'F' AND b.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND (c.DT_SGMNT_STTS_CD ='CHECKED_OUT' OR c.DT_SGMNT_STTS_CD ='BUILDING') AND spr.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id= a.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id AND spr.prod_family IN (SELECT column_value FROM TABLE(CAST(STR2TBL( (SELECT CASE WHEN prod_fmly_nm = 'POS' THEN 'HMO,PPO' WHEN prod_fmly_nm = 'HMO' THEN 'HMO' ELSE 'PPO' END FROM prod_mstr WHERE prod_sys_id =c.prod_sys_id ) ) AS nt_varchar2)) ) GROUP BY a.SPS_VALDN_FLAG

SELECT distinct c.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, c.BNFT_CMPNT_NM, b.PROCS_RUNNING_FLAG FROM ENTY_BNFT_SPS_VALDN_PRCSS b, PROD_BNFT_AFFCTD_SPS a, BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR c where b.ENTY_SYS_ID = {0} and b.ENTY_TYPE in('PRODUCT','TIERPRODUCT') and b.PROCS_RUNNING_FLAG = 'T' AND a.LST_CHG_TMS = (SELECT MAX(LST_CHG_TMS) FROM PROD_BNFT_AFFCTD_SPS WHERE ENTY_SYS_ID = {0}) AND a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = c.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID and a.ENTY_SYS_ID = b.ENTY_SYS_ID

SELECT distinct c.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, c.BNFT_CMPNT_NM, b.PROCS_RUNNING_FLAG FROM ENTY_BNFT_SPS_VALDN_PRCSS b, PROD_STRCTR_BNFT_AFFCTD_SPS a, BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR c where b.ENTY_SYS_ID = {0} and b.ENTY_TYPE = {1} and b.PROCS_RUNNING_FLAG = 'T' AND a.LST_CHG_TMS = (SELECT MAX(LST_CHG_TMS) FROM PROD_STRCTR_BNFT_AFFCTD_SPS WHERE ENTY_SYS_ID = {0}) AND a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = c.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID and a.ENTY_SYS_ID = b.ENTY_SYS_ID

SELECT distinct c.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, c.BNFT_CMPNT_NM, b.PROCS_RUNNING_FLAG FROM ENTY_BNFT_SPS_VALDN_PRCSS b, CNTRCT_BNFT_AFFCTD_SPS a, BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR c where b.ENTY_SYS_ID = {2} and b.ENTY_TYPE in('CONTRACT','TIERCONTRACT') and b.PROCS_RUNNING_FLAG = 'T' AND a.LST_CHG_TMS = (SELECT MAX(LST_CHG_TMS) FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_AFFCTD_SPS WHERE ENTY_SYS_ID = {0}) AND a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = c.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID and a.ENTY_SYS_ID = {0}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT c.enty_sys_id, c.prod_sys_id , c.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id , c.bnft_sys_id , c.bnft_admtn_id , c.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id FROM CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT A , CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN B , cntrct_bnft_affctd_sps C , CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN D , spr_prcss_stp_mstr spr WHERE D.cntrct_sys_id ={0} AND D.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = B.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND B.dt_sgmnt_sys_id =A.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND B.bnft_cmpnt_hide_flag ='F' AND B.bnft_hide_flag ='F' AND C.enty_sys_id =B.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND C.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = B.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND C.bnft_sys_id =B.bnft_sys_id AND c.prcss_repeat_flag ='F' AND c.prcss_running_flag ='E' AND C.sps_valdn_flag ='P' AND spr.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id=c.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id AND spr.prod_family IN (SELECT column_value FROM TABLE(CAST(STR2TBL( (SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN prod_fmly_nm = 'POS' THEN 'HMO,PPO' WHEN prod_fmly_nm = 'HMO' THEN 'HMO' ELSE 'PPO' END FROM prod_mstr WHERE prod_sys_id IN (SELECT A.prod_sys_id FROM CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT A , CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN B , cntrct_bnft_affctd_sps C , CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN D , spr_prcss_stp_mstr spr WHERE D.cntrct_sys_id ={0} AND D.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = B.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND B.dt_sgmnt_sys_id =A.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND B.bnft_cmpnt_hide_flag ='F' AND B.bnft_hide_flag ='F' AND C.enty_sys_id =B.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND C.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = B.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND C.bnft_sys_id =B.bnft_sys_id AND c.prcss_repeat_flag ='F' AND c.prcss_running_flag ='E' AND C.sps_valdn_flag ='P' AND spr.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id=c.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id ) ) ) AS nt_varchar2)) ) )

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: DELETE FROM PROD_STRCTR_BNFT_AFFCTD_SPS WHERE ENTY_SYS_ID = ? and BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = ? and BNFT_ADMTN_ID = ? and SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID = ?

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID FROM cntrct_bnft_affctd_sps WHERE ENTY_SYS_ID = ?

select SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID,CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID, spr_prcss_stp_nm ,admn_mthd_sys_id , admn_mthd_desc , admn_mthd_req_sps , cd_desc_txt , value , type, dbms_random.random, admn_mthd_sps_grp_id, prod_family, AM_TYPE from ( select A.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID,A.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID, A.spr_prcss_stp_nm ,A.admn_mthd_sys_id , A.admn_mthd_desc ,A.admn_mthd_req_sps , A.cd_desc_txt , A.value , A.type, dbms_random.random, A.admn_mthd_sps_grp_id, A.prod_family, 'GENERAL' as AM_TYPE from ( select distinct A.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID,A.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID, b.spr_prcss_stp_nm ,C.admn_mthd_sys_id , d.admn_mthd_desc , f.admn_mthd_req_sps , g.cd_desc_txt , h.BNFT_LINE_CODED_VAL as value , 'Benefit Line' as type, f.admn_mthd_sps_grp_id , B.prod_family, 'GENERAL' as AM_TYPE from cntrct_bnft_affctd_sps A ,SPR_PRCSS_STP_MSTR B , ( select spr_prcss_stp_sys_id,NVL(SB,GB) As admn_mthd_sys_id from ( select A.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id,A.admn_mthd_sys_id AS GB,B.admn_mthd_sys_id AS SB from ( select A.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id, a.admn_mthd_sys_id from admn_mthd_ovrd A , bcm_bnft_cmpnt_mstr B WHERE a.enty_type = 'contract' and a.enty_sys_id = {0} and a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id and b.bnft_cmpnt_nm ='GENERAL BENEFITS' ) A LEFT JOIN admn_mthd_ovrd B on B.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id=A.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id AND b.enty_type = 'contract' and b.enty_sys_id = {0} and b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = {2} and b.bnft_admtn_id = {4} ) )C, admn_mthd_mstr D ,ADMN_MTHD_SPS_GRP E,ADMN_MTHD_SPS_GRP_MAP F ,ITEM G , ( SELECT A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID, C.PROD_SYS_ID , A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID , A.BNFT_SYS_ID , A.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID , A.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID , A.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID , A.BNFT_LINE_CODED_VAL , B.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG , A.LST_CHG_TMS , A.LST_CHG_USR , A.CREATD_TM_STMP , A.CREATD_USER_ID , B.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_CODED_LINES A, cntrct_bnft_assn B , cntrct_dt_sgmnt C WHERE A.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = B.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND a.bnft_sys_id = b.bnft_sys_id AND a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = c.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} AND c.prod_sys_id = {1} AND A.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = {2} AND A.bnft_sys_id = {3}
UNION
SELECT A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID, C.PROD_SYS_ID , A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID , A.BNFT_SYS_ID , A.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID , A.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID , A.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID , A.BNFT_LINE_CODED_VAL , B.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG , A.LST_CHG_TMS , A.LST_CHG_USR , A.CREATD_TM_STMP , A.CREATD_USER_ID , B.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_CODED_LINES A, cntrct_bnft_assn B , cntrct_dt_sgmnt C , bcm_bnft_cmpnt_mstr D WHERE A.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = B.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND a.bnft_sys_id = b.bnft_sys_id AND a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = c.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = D.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND D.bnft_cmpnt_nm ='GENERAL BENEFITS' AND a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {0} AND c.prod_sys_id = {1} AND b.bnft_cmpnt_hide_flag ='F' AND b.bnft_hide_flag = 'F' ) H,BLN_BNFT_LINE I where A.enty_sys_id ={0} AND A.prod_sys_id ={1} AND A.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id={2} AND A.bnft_sys_id ={3} AND A.bnft_admtn_id = {4} AND A.sps_valdn_flag ='P' AND A.prcss_repeat_flag='F' AND A.prcss_running_flag='E' AND b.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id =a.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id AND C.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id=A.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id AND d.admn_mthd_sys_id= c.admn_mthd_sys_id AND E.admn_mthd_sys_id = c.admn_mthd_sys_id AND f.admn_mthd_sps_grp_id= e.admn_mthd_sps_grp_id AND f.admn_mthd_req_sps = g.prmry_cd (+) AND g.ctlg_id (+) =1938 AND I.blvl_bnft_lvl_id =H.blvl_bnft_lvl_id AND I.bln_bnft_line_id =H.bln_bnft_line_id AND I.BNFT_LVL_EXTRNL_RFRNC_ID = F.admn_mthd_req_sps ) A
UNION ALL
select A.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID,A.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID, b.spr_prcss_stp_nm ,C.admn_mthd_sys_id , d.admn_mthd_desc , f.admn_mthd_req_sps , g.cd_desc_txt , J.psbl_answr as value , 'Question' as type, dbms_random.random, f.admn_mthd_sps_grp_id , B.prod_family, 'GENERAL' as AM_TYPE from cntrct_bnft_affctd_sps A ,SPR_PRCSS_STP_MSTR B , ( select spr_prcss_stp_sys_id,NVL(SB,GB) As admn_mthd_sys_id from ( select A.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id,A.admn_mthd_sys_id AS GB,B.admn_mthd_sys_id AS SB from ( select A.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id, a.admn_mthd_sys_id from admn_mthd_ovrd A , bcm_bnft_cmpnt_mstr B WHERE a.enty_type = 'contract' and a.enty_sys_id = {0} and a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id and b.bnft_cmpnt_nm ='GENERAL BENEFITS' ) A LEFT JOIN admn_mthd_ovrd B on B.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id=A.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id AND b.enty_type = 'contract' and b.enty_sys_id = {0} and b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = {2} and b.bnft_admtn_id = {4} ) )C, admn_mthd_mstr D ,ADMN_MTHD_SPS_GRP E,ADMN_MTHD_SPS_GRP_MAP F ,ITEM G , cntrct_answr_ovrd H, qstnr_mstr I, psbl_answr J ,BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN K where A.enty_sys_id ={0} AND A.prod_sys_id ={1} AND A.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id={2} AND A.bnft_sys_id ={3} AND A.bnft_admtn_id = {4} AND A.sps_valdn_flag ='P' AND A.prcss_repeat_flag='F' AND A.prcss_running_flag='E' AND b.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id =a.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id AND C.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id =A.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id AND d.admn_mthd_sys_id= c.admn_mthd_sys_id AND E.admn_mthd_sys_id = c.admn_mthd_sys_id AND f.admn_mthd_sps_grp_id= e.admn_mthd_sps_grp_id AND f.admn_mthd_req_sps = g.prmry_cd (+) AND g.ctlg_id (+) =1938 AND H.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id=A.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND H.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = A.enty_sys_id AND k.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id =H.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND k.bnft_admin_sys_id =A.bnft_admtn_id AND I.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID =H.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID AND I.admin_opt_sys_id = k.admin_opt_sys_id AND J.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR=I.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR AND f.admn_mthd_req_sps =I.rfrnc_id AND J.PSBL_ANSWR_ID=H.OVRD_ANSWR_ID
UNION ALL
select A.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID,A.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID, b.spr_prcss_stp_nm ,C.admn_mthd_sys_id , d.admn_mthd_desc , f.admn_mthd_req_sps , g.cd_desc_txt , H.psbl_answr as value , 'Question' as type, dbms_random.random, f.admn_mthd_sps_grp_id , B.prod_family, 'GENERAL' as AM_TYPE from cntrct_bnft_affctd_sps A ,SPR_PRCSS_STP_MSTR B , ( select spr_prcss_stp_sys_id,NVL(SB,GB) As admn_mthd_sys_id from ( select A.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id,A.admn_mthd_sys_id AS GB,B.admn_mthd_sys_id AS SB from ( select A.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id, a.admn_mthd_sys_id from admn_mthd_ovrd A , bcm_bnft_cmpnt_mstr B WHERE a.enty_type = 'contract' and a.enty_sys_id = {0} and a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id and b.bnft_cmpnt_nm ='GENERAL BENEFITS' ) A LEFT JOIN admn_mthd_ovrd B on B.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id=A.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id AND b.enty_type = 'contract' and b.enty_sys_id = {0} and b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = {2} and b.bnft_admtn_id = {4} ) )C, admn_mthd_mstr D ,ADMN_MTHD_SPS_GRP E,ADMN_MTHD_SPS_GRP_MAP F ,ITEM G , ( SELECT distinct A.rfrnc_id,D.psbl_answr FROM CNTRCT_ANSWR_OVRD b, ( SELECT a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id, a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN a, BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR b WHERE a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND b.bnft_cmpnt_nm = 'GENERAL BENEFITS' AND a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {0} GROUP BY a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id, a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id ) q, CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN p, ( select distinct ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID from ( SELECT distinct e.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID FROM CNTRCT_ANSWR_OVRD b,BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN c, ADMIN_OPT_MSTR e , PSBL_ANSWR f WHERE c.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = b.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND b.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {0} AND b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = {2} AND c.bnft_admin_sys_id = {4} AND c.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = e.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID and f.PSBL_ANSWR_ID = b.ovrd_answr_id --and upper(f.psbl_answr) != 'NOT ANSWERED'
UNION
SELECT distinct e.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID FROM cntrct_tier_answr_ovrd b, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN c, ADMIN_OPT_MSTR e , PSBL_ANSWR f WHERE c.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = b.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND b.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {0} AND b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = {2} AND c.bnft_admin_sys_id = {4} AND c.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = e.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID and f.PSBL_ANSWR_ID = b.ovrd_answr_id --and upper(f.psbl_answr) != 'NOT ANSWERED' ) ) v, ADMIN_OPT_MSTR e, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN k , qstnr_mstr A ,PSBL_ANSWR D WHERE b.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = q.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = q.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND p.bnft_hide_flag = 'F' AND p.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND p.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = q.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND p.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = q.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND p.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = k.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID AND b.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = k.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID AND e.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = k.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID AND e.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID = v.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID(+) AND v.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID IS NULL AND A.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id =b.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id AND A.admin_opt_sys_id=k.admin_opt_sys_id AND D.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr = A.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr AND D.psbl_answr_id =B.ovrd_answr_id )H where A.enty_sys_id ={0} AND A.prod_sys_id ={1} AND A.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id={2} AND A.bnft_sys_id ={3} AND A.bnft_admtn_id = {4} AND A.sps_valdn_flag ='P' AND A.prcss_repeat_flag='F' AND A.prcss_running_flag='E' AND b.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id =a.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id AND C.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id =A.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id AND d.admn_mthd_sys_id= c.admn_mthd_sys_id AND E.admn_mthd_sys_id = c.admn_mthd_sys_id AND f.admn_mthd_sps_grp_id= e.admn_mthd_sps_grp_id AND f.admn_mthd_req_sps = g.prmry_cd (+) AND g.ctlg_id (+) =1938 AND H.rfrnc_id=F.admn_mthd_req_sps
UNION ALL
select A.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID,A.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID, b.spr_prcss_stp_nm ,C.admn_mthd_sys_id , d.admn_mthd_desc , f.admn_mthd_req_sps , g.cd_desc_txt , J.psbl_answr as value , 'Question' as type, dbms_random.random, f.admn_mthd_sps_grp_id, B.prod_family, 'GENERAL' as AM_TYPE from cntrct_bnft_affctd_sps A ,SPR_PRCSS_STP_MSTR B , ( select spr_prcss_stp_sys_id,NVL(SB,GB) As admn_mthd_sys_id from ( select A.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id,A.admn_mthd_sys_id AS GB,B.admn_mthd_sys_id AS SB from ( select A.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id, a.admn_mthd_sys_id from admn_mthd_ovrd A , bcm_bnft_cmpnt_mstr B WHERE a.enty_type = 'contract' and a.enty_sys_id = {0} and a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id and b.bnft_cmpnt_nm ='GENERAL BENEFITS' ) A LEFT JOIN admn_mthd_ovrd B on B.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id=A.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id AND b.enty_type = 'contract' and b.enty_sys_id = {0} and b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = {2} and b.bnft_admtn_id = {4} ) )C, admn_mthd_mstr D ,ADMN_MTHD_SPS_GRP E,ADMN_MTHD_SPS_GRP_MAP F ,ITEM G , qstnr_mstr I, psbl_answr J, CNTRCT_ADMIN_QSTN_ANSWR_OVRD L where A.enty_sys_id ={0} AND A.prod_sys_id ={1} AND A.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id={2} AND A.bnft_sys_id ={3} AND A.bnft_admtn_id = {4} AND A.sps_valdn_flag ='P' AND A.prcss_repeat_flag='F' AND A.prcss_running_flag='E' AND b.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id =a.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id AND C.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id=A.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id AND d.admn_mthd_sys_id= c.admn_mthd_sys_id AND E.admn_mthd_sys_id = c.admn_mthd_sys_id AND f.admn_mthd_sps_grp_id= e.admn_mthd_sps_grp_id AND f.admn_mthd_req_sps = g.prmry_cd (+) AND g.ctlg_id (+) =1938 and l.dt_sgmnt_sys_id= a.enty_sys_id and I.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id=l.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id and I.admin_opt_sys_id =l.admin_opt_sys_id AND J.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR=I.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR AND f.admn_mthd_req_sps =I.rfrnc_id AND J.PSBL_ANSWR_ID=l.ovrd_answr_id

select A.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID,A.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID, b.spr_prcss_stp_nm ,C.admn_mthd_sys_id , d.admn_mthd_desc , f.admn_mthd_req_sps , g.cd_desc_txt , 'INVALID' as value, 'ALL' as type, dbms_random.random, f.admn_mthd_sps_grp_id , B.prod_family, 'GENERAL' as AM_TYPE from cntrct_bnft_affctd_sps A ,SPR_PRCSS_STP_MSTR B , ( select spr_prcss_stp_sys_id,NVL(SB,GB) As admn_mthd_sys_id from ( select A.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id,A.admn_mthd_sys_id AS GB,B.admn_mthd_sys_id AS SB from ( select A.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id, a.admn_mthd_sys_id from admn_mthd_ovrd A , bcm_bnft_cmpnt_mstr B WHERE a.enty_type = 'contract' and a.enty_sys_id = {0} and a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id and b.bnft_cmpnt_nm ='GENERAL BENEFITS' ) A LEFT JOIN admn_mthd_ovrd B on B.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id=A.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id AND b.enty_type = 'contract' and b.enty_sys_id = {0} and b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = {2} and b.bnft_admtn_id = {4} ) )C, admn_mthd_mstr D ,ADMN_MTHD_SPS_GRP E,ADMN_MTHD_SPS_GRP_MAP F ,ITEM G where A.enty_sys_id ={0} AND A.prod_sys_id ={1} AND A.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id={2} AND A.bnft_sys_id ={3} AND A.bnft_admtn_id = {4} AND A.sps_valdn_flag ='P' AND A.prcss_repeat_flag='F' AND A.prcss_running_flag='E' AND b.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id =a.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id AND C.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id=A.spr_prcss_stp_sys_id AND d.admn_mthd_sys_id= c.admn_mthd_sys_id AND E.admn_mthd_sys_id = c.admn_mthd_sys_id AND f.admn_mthd_sps_grp_id= e.admn_mthd_sps_grp_id AND f.admn_mthd_req_sps = g.prmry_cd (+) AND g.ctlg_id (+) =1938
) nontier where nontier.cntrct_tier_sys_id=-1

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: select ENTY_SYS_ID from ADMN_MTHD_TIER_OVRD

SelectSQLQuery.name: searchSPSNamesForOverrideInTiers
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID, s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_NM, s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_REF,s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_REF_ID, a.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID, m.ADMN_MTHD_DESC, a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID,m.ADMN_MTHD_NO from SPR_PRCSS_STP_MSTR s, ADMN_MTHD_TIER_OVRD a, ADMN_MTHD_MSTR m where a.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID = m.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID and a.ENTY_SYS_ID = {0} and a.ENTY_TYPE = {1} and a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {3} and a.ENTY_TIER_SYS_ID = {4} and s.TRM_PRMRY_CDS IN (SELECT column_value FROM TABLE(CAST(Str2tbl({5}) AS nt_varchar2)))
)order by SPR_PRCSS_STP_NM

SelectSQLQuery.name: fetchSPS_AM_MappingForTieredOverridenWithProductFamily
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID, s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_NM, s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_REF,s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_REF_ID, a.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID, m.ADMN_MTHD_DESC, a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID,m.ADMN_MTHD_NO,s.PROD_FAMILY,s.TRM_PRMRY_CDS from SPR_PRCSS_STP_MSTR s, ADMN_MTHD_TIER_OVRD a, ADMN_MTHD_MSTR m where a.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID = m.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID and a.ENTY_SYS_ID = {0} and a.ENTY_TYPE = {1} and a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {3} and a.ENTY_TIER_SYS_ID = {4} and s.TRM_PRMRY_CDS IN (SELECT column_value FROM TABLE(CAST(String2table({5},'#') AS nt_varchar2)))

and a.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID = m.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID and s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID = a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID and a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID = m.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID and s.prod_family in (SELECT column_value FROM TABLE(CAST(String2table({6},',') AS nt_varchar2))) --added for POS union select distinct s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID, s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_NM, s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_REF, s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_REF_ID,null,'', null, null ,s.prod_family,s.TRM_PRMRY_CDS --added for POS from SPR_PRCSS_STP_MSTR s where s.TRM_PRMRY_CDS IN (SELECT column_value FROM TABLE(CAST(String2table({5},'#') AS nt_varchar2))) and s.prod_family in (SELECT column_value FROM TABLE(CAST(String2table({6},',') AS nt_varchar2))) --added for POS and s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID not in (select SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID from ADMN_MTHD_TIER_OVRD a where a.ENTY_SYS_ID = {0} and a.ENTY_TYPE = {1} and a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {3} --and s.prod_family in (SELECT column_value FROM TABLE(CAST(String2table({6},',') AS nt_varchar2))) --added for POS and a.ENTY_TIER_SYS_ID = {4}
)order by SPR_PRCSS_STP_NM ASC,PROD_FAMILY DESC

DataSource.SelectSQLQuery:
SELECT s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID, s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_NM, s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_REF,s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_REF_ID,a.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID, m.ADMN_MTHD_DESC, a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID, m.ADMN_MTHD_NO,s.TRM_PRMRY_CDS,s.prod_family, a.ENTY_TIER_SYS_ID, dbms_random.random FROM SPR_PRCSS_STP_MSTR s,ADMN_MTHD_TIER_OVRD a, ADMN_MTHD_MSTR m WHERE a.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID = m.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID AND a.ENTY_SYS_ID = {0}AND a.ENTY_TYPE = {1} AND a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {3} AND a.BNFT_ADMTN_ID = {2} AND a.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID = m.ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID AND s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID = a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID AND a.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID = m.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID
union select distinct s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID, s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_NM, s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_REF, s.SPR_PRCSS_STP_REF_ID,null,'', null, null ,s.prod_family,s.TRM_PRMRY_CDS, 0,dbms_random.random --added for POS from SPR_PRCSS_STP_MSTR s order by SPR_PRCSS_STP_NM ASC,PROD_FAMILY DESC

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: INSERT INTO ADMN_MTHD_TIER_OVRD ( ENTY_TYPE,ENTY_SYS_ID, BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, BNFT_ADMTN_ID, SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID, ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID,ENTY_TIER_SYS_ID,LST_CHG_USR, LST_CHG_TMS, CREATD_USER_ID, CREATD_TM_STMP) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?,?,?)
UPDATE ADMN_MTHD_TIER_OVRD SET ADMN_MTHD_SYS_ID = ? WHERE ENTY_TYPE = ? and ENTY_SYS_ID = ? and BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = ? and BNFT_ADMTN_ID = ? and SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID = ? and ENTY_TIER_SYS_ID = ?
DELETE FROM ADMN_MTHD_TIER_OVRD WHERE ENTY_TYPE = ? and ENTY_SYS_ID = ? and BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = ? and BNFT_ADMTN_ID = ? and SPR_PRCSS_STP_SYS_ID = ? and ENTY_TIER_SYS_ID = ?
